doc:
Paul Schwegler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Schwegler 0 Paul Anthony Schwegler, (May 22, 1907 – December 7, 1980) was born to immigrant parents from Germany and Russian Poland, and was an American football tackle. His college football experience helped to launch an acting career in Hollywood during the 1930s, first paying minor parts in football films and later in other genres, such as the drama film 365 Nights in Hollywood (1934). A two-time All-American tackle, He was elected to the College Football Hall of Fame in 1967.
